section.titls:
Alien interface generation
There're so many useful C and C++ libraries that can be used almost instantly with TRE - as long as 'gccxml' (see http://www.gccxml.org) is also installed.
(ALIEN-CREATE include-stream library-name identifier-prefix)
(alien-create "File.hh" "ng" "file-") (with (f (file-lookup pathname)) (file-lookup)
Unfortunately, TRE doesn't support namespaces.
